summary.Title: Public Area Cleaning at NEW small Luxury Hotel
summary.JobHeadline: Public Area Cleaning at NEW small Luxury Hotel
summary.Presentation: Keeperz is currently seaching for a new team member with high energy, a "Yes we can - attitude" & Great eye for details to manage the Public Area (inside & outside) at a New small Luxury Hotel in C

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Public Area Cleaning at NEW small Luxury Hotel
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Keeperz is currently seaching for a new team member with high energy, a "Yes we can - attitude" & Great eye for details to manage the Public Area (inside & outside) at a New small Luxury Hotel in Central Copenhagen (close to Østerport Station).

Contract min. 25H pr. week - Possible to get up to 30-33H pr. week

Working hours from 09.00 - 14.30. When the hotel open April/May it will be possible to work longer shifts and get more hours.

Working tasks:
Cleaning Public Area, broom outside & remove spiderwebs, water plants outside, wash/dry/fold towels and bathrobes, linen refilling, change light bulbs, checking water in spa, clean/refill coffee machines and so on. 

To apply you must have:

  • A great eye for details and be highly service-minded
  • Be able to work every 2. weekend (if needed)
  • Hotel cleaning experience is a +
  • Fluent in English

Please forward your CV and picture to info@keeperz.dk

I look forward to hear from you.

Best regards,

Kenneth Willemoes
Keeperz ApS
www.Keeperz.dk
